attributes.action: Make all employees able to furlough, not just those on PAYE on 28th February 20
attributes.additional_details: If the government don’t do this people will lose their homes & face immense hardship.
attributes.background: The government are advising they will only allow employees who were on PAYE on 28th February 20 to be furloughed, I want all employees who are on PAYE to be entitled to be furloughed.
